Articles.Content:
A third Forty-Two Industries plane!

This plane focuses mainly on small size, scouting at a reasonable distance, yet having to pack more punches with slugs.

Here are the improvements from the all-purpose Pegasus.

-Double amount of railguns and ammunition

-Easier to manuever outside of the atmosphere

-More VTOL power and capabilities

-Able to take hard vertical landings (20m/s)

It does however contain the lack of gliding performance, due to little space for aerlons

--Answers to Questions section--
